contentList.content: Divine Intervention
Utilized in prayer to divine various types of miracles.
Belief and Bestowment

Your god bestows gifts at random, projecting their power through you. Each turn while in combat, you have a 33% chance to receive one charge of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="DivineIntervention">Divine Intervention</LSTag>.
Divine Miracles

Utilize your charge of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="DivineIntervention">Divine Intervention</LSTag> to produce a Miracle of your choice. Your Miracles grow stronger as you gain levels as a Cleric and change depending on your choice of subclass.
Divine Miracles: Arcane Bounty
You flow with limitless arcane energy. You recover a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag> of the highest level you are capable of casting based on your levels in Cleric.
Divine Miracles: Deific Power
The power of your god erupts from within you, bathing all nearby enemies in a damaging radiance.
Divine Miracles: Deific Recovery

The mercy of your god overflows from within you, soothing all nearby allies and granting them the effects of both <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_LesserRestoration">Latent Restoration</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_GreaterRestoration">Great Cleanse</LSTag>.
Divine Miracles: Deific Storm

The wrath of your god strikes from within you, thunderously jolting all nearby enemies. On a successful <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, the affected targets will take Thunder damage instead.
Divine Miracles: Deific Warpath
The warpath of your god marches ever forward around you, bathing all nearby enemies in wanton, war-driven radiance.
Divine Miracles: Deific Necrosis

The anger of your god seeps out from within you, rotting all nearby enemies in putrid necrosis. Any within the area of effect already suffering from a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PLAGUEOFROT">Plague of Rot</LSTag> will receive an additional stack.
Divine Miracles: Holy Restoration
Feelings of soothing mercy flow from within, restoring the <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> of all nearby allies.
Divine Miracles: Wreathed in Radiance
You and your allies become wreathed in a divine blessing, causing your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> to gain a bonus equal to half your levels in Cleric for three turns.
Wreathed in Radiance

Affected creature is wreathed in a divine blessing, causing their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> to gain a bonus equal to half the levels in Cleric of whomever applied this condition.
Pacify Undead
Pray for your god to pacify all nearby Undead, holding them still. Attacks made against them from within [1] will always be <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.
Pacified
Affected creature is perfectly still, unable to act. Attacks made against them within [1] are always <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.

You gain the ability to channel divine energy, allowing you to dominate Undead foes and provide boons for your allies. Replenished by <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Death Domain
You nourish your faith on forces that make dealings in death, giving rise to desolate plague and putrid necrosis alike.
Corpse Party

Gain the ability to detonate nearby corpses, dealing Necrotic damage to all creatures in a [1] radius. This action may also target Undead creatures.

When damaging a creature, this action will always apply one stack of Plague of Rot.
Bursting Sinew

Detonate a nearby corpse, dealing Necrotic damage to all creatures in a [1] radius. This action may also target Undead creatures.

When damaging a creature, this action will always apply one stack of Plague of Rot.
Plague of Rot
Affected creature takes [1] at the beginning of each of their turns for each stack of Plague of Rot they have. At the end of each of their turns, they receive one additional stack.
Channel Divinity: Curse of Undeath

Gain the ability to use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity</LSTag> charge to place a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CURSEOFUNDEATH">Curse of Undeath</LSTag> upon a creature.
Channel Divinity: Curse of Undeath

Place a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CURSEOFUNDEATH">Curse of Undeath</LSTag> upon a creature. They are then considered to be Undead, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Necrotic and Poison damage.
Curse of Rot
Affected creature is considered to be Undead. They have <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Necrotic and Poison damage.
Harvest

While within [1] of a corpse, they radiate a necrotic aura, dealing [2] to all enemies within [3] at the start of each of their turns and preventing them from recovering Hit Points.

When damaging a creature suffering from a Plague of Rot, they receive one additional stack as well. This can be toggled at any time.
Fresh Harvest

Affected corpse is radiating a necrotic aura, dealing [1] to all enemies within [2] at the start of each of their turns and preventing them from recovering Hit Points.

When damaging a creature suffering from a Plague of Rot, they receive one additional stack as well.
Harvest's Yield

Affected creature is taking [1] at the start of each of their turns and cannot recover Hit Points.

If the affected creature is also suffering from a Plague of Rot, they receive one additional stack per turn as well.
Insurmountable Suffering
When damaging enemies you ignore all forms of <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunities</LSTag> to Necrotic damage.
True Pestilence
At the beginning of each of their turns, creatures with a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PLAGUEOFROT">Plague of Rot</LSTag> spread it to their allies within [1] of them.
Death of the Firstborns
The first instance of Necrotic damage you deal in a combat encounter causes your targets to become <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to all damage for one turn.
Death of the Firstborns
Affected creature is <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to all damage for one turn.
Virtuous Touch
When healing a creature, the target regains additional <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> equal to your level.
Preserve Life
Evoke a healing radiance which restores your or an allies <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> by your level multiplied by four.
Benevolent Grace
When healing a creature, you also apply <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHIELD_OF_FAITH">Shield of Faith</LSTag> for three turns.
Dampen Elements
When you or an ally is about to receive elemental damage, you can use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity</LSTag> to halve the damage of the attack.
Dampen Elements
When you or an ally is about to receive elemental damage, halve the attack's damage.
Sanctity
When healing a creature, you also apply <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESISTANCE">Resistance</LSTag> for three turns.
Divine Presence

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PreserveLife">Preserve Life</LSTag> is now able to target the corpses of fallen allies. Targeting a dead ally with Preserve Life will resurrect them with all of their <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.
Discharge

Once per action, when dealing damage to a creature, you create projectiles of of Cold, Lightning, or Thunder. These projectiles jump to two other enemies within [1] of your target, dealing damage equal to your levels in Cleric to all three targets.
Discharge (Cold)

Once per action, when dealing damage to a creature, you create jagged shards of ice. These shards jump to two other enemies within [1] of your target, dealing Cold damage equal to your levels in Cleric to all three targets.
Discharge (Lightning)

Once per action, when dealing damage to a creature, you create arcing bolts of Lightning. These bolts jump to two other enemies within [1] of your target, dealing Lightning damage equal to your levels in Cleric to all three targets.
Discharge (Thunder)

Once per action, when dealing damage to a creature, you create booming spheres of Thunder. These spheres jump to two other enemies within [1] of your target, dealing Thunder damage equal to your levels in Cleric to all three targets.
Eruptive Discharge

Once per action, when dealing damage to a creature, you create projectiles of of Cold, Lightning, or Thunder. These projectiles jump to all other enemies within [1] of your target, dealing damage equal to your levels in Cleric to all targets.
Eruptive Discharge (Cold)

Once per action, when dealing damage to a creature, you create jagged shards of ice. These shards jump to all other enemies within [1] of your target, dealing Cold damage equal to your levels in Cleric to all targets.
Eruptive Discharge (Lightning)

Once per action, when dealing damage to a creature, you create arcing bolts of Lightning. These bolts jump to all other enemies within [1] of your target, dealing Lightning damage equal to your levels in Cleric to all targets.
Eruptive Discharge (Thunder)

Once per action, when dealing damage to a creature, you create booming spheres of Thunder. These spheres jump to all other enemies within [1] of your target, dealing Thunder damage equal to your levels in Cleric to all targets.
Destructive Wrath

When dealing Cold, Lightning or Thunder based damage, you may expend a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity</LSTag> charge in order to maximize the damage dealt for that action.
Destructive Wrath
When dealing Cold, Lightning or Thunder damage, maximize the damage dealt for that action.
Downpour

Once per turn, you may cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CreateWater">Create Water</LSTag> as a level one Spell as a free action. In addition, <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Discharge">Discharge</LSTag> now targets all enemies within [1] of you.
Downpour
Affected creature may cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CreateWater">Create Water</LSTag> as a level one Spell as a free action.
Wrath of the Storm

As a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>, strike back at a creature who has damaged you within a range of [1], dealing Cold, Lightning, or Thunder damage equal to your level.
Wrath of the Storm: Lightning
When an enemy damages you within a range of [1], retaliate with a strike of lightning that deals damage equal to your level.
Wrath of the Storm: Thunder
When an enemy damages you within a range of [1], retaliate with a crash of thunder that deals damage equal to your level.
Wrath of the Storm: Cold
When an enemy damages you within a range of [1], retaliate with a frigid cold that deals damage equal to your level.
Storm Strike
When you deal Cold, Lightning or Thunder damage to an enemy that is Large or smaller, you also push it away from where you stand by [1]. This effect can be toggled at any time.
Static Shock

When you deal Cold, Lightning or Thunder damage, your target must succeed a Constitution based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag>.
Radiant Strikes
Deal an additional [1] on any successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
War God's Blessing

Bestow the glory of your god, using your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> and a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity</LSTag> charge to grant either yourself or an ally within [1] a +[2] bonus to an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
War God's Blessing
Gain a +[1] bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
War God's Blessing: Ally
Grant an ally within [1] a +[2] bonus to their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Divine Faith
After using one of your Miracles, gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and damage rolls for the rest of your turn.
Divine Faith
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and damage for the rest of their turn.
War Priest
When you make an unarmed or weapon based attack against a target, you can make an additional attack as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
War Priest
Affected creature may make an additional attack as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
War Priest (Melee)
Make an additional <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
War Priest (Ranged)
Make an additional <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
War Priest

Make an additional <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attacks</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
Deific
After using one of your Miracles, your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> will always roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Deific
Affected creature's next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> will always roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
War God's Vessel
When you utilize your War God's Blessing in order to succeed an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, the bonus to your Attack Rolls remains active for three turns.
War God's Vessel
Affected character has a +10 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Holy Divinations

Blessed be the Cleric who receives such gracious gifts from their god.
A veritable sign commanding prayers become power.
Aegis
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Constitution based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Blessed Resolve

Upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> on a non-allied creature, emit an aura which <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS">Blesses</LSTag> all allies within [1] of you for three turns.
Blood for Blood

The first time you heal a creature each turn, the number you need in order to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by 1. This effect will reset upon landing a Critical Hit.
Blood for Blood

Affected creature will roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> more easily. The number required is reduced by 1 for each stack of Blood for Blood. This effect will reset once they have rolled a Critical Hit.
Consecrative Sacrifice

Upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> on a non-allied creature, emit a healing aura across [1] which restores +1d6 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> multiplied by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to yourself and all allies. This effect can trigger once per turn.
Divine Commune
Increase your odds of experiencing instances of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="DivineIntervention">Divine Intervention</LSTag> from 33% to 50%.
Divine Restoration

At the end of any combat encounter, emit a healing aura across [1] which restores +1d6 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> multiplied by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to yourself and all allies.
Ethereal Intuition
Permanently gain the affects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GUIDANCE">Guidance</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESISTANCE">Resistance</LSTag>.
Fell Repentance

When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an ally within [1], you may use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to retaliate with either <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ChillTouch">Bone Chill</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SacredFlame">Sacred Flame</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SparkSurge">Spark Surge</LSTag>.
Fell Repentance: Bone Chill
When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an ally within [1], retaliate with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ChillTouch">Bone Chill</LSTag>.
Fell Repentance: Sacred Flame
When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an ally within [1], retaliate with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SacredFlame">Sacred Flame</LSTag>.
Fell Repentance: Spark Surge
When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an ally within [1], retaliate with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SparkSurge">Spark Surge</LSTag>.
Guided Strikes
Upon healing a creature with a Spell, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Guided Strikes
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Holy Fortitude
While below half of your total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, you regain the maximum amount of Hit Points possible when healed.
Holy Fortitude
Affected creature will regain the maximum amount of <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> possible when healed.
Immaculate Retribution

When an enemy damages you with a melee based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, deal damage to them equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Wisdom Modifier</LSTag> multiplied by two. The type of damage dealt changes depending on your choice of subclass.
Immaculate Ward

When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you, you may use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> and one of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity</LSTag> charges in order to receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADE_WARD_IMMACULATE">Immaculate Blade Ward</LSTag> for one turn.
Immaculate Ward
When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you, receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADE_WARD_IMMACULATE">Immaculate Blade Ward</LSTag> for one turn.
Immaculate Blade Ward
Affected creature is <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to the next instance of Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage that they would have suffered.
Martyrdom
Upon being <LSTag Tooltip="Downed">Downed</LSTag> or killed, erupt as a raging inferno, uncontrollably scorching everything around you.
Paradisiacal Gift

Once per turn, upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> against an enemy, immediately recover one of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity</LSTag> charges.
Sacral Touch
Upon healing a creature, potentially experience an instance of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="DivineIntervention">Divine Intervention</LSTag>. This may only occur once per turn.
Sanctified Presence
At the beginning of each of your turns in combat, regain <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> multiplied by two.
Sanctifying Aura
Emit an aura across [1] which provides <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SANCTUARY">Sanctuary</LSTag> to allies who are <LSTag Tooltip="Downed">Downed</LSTag>.
Stalwart
Permanently gain the affects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISPEL_EVIL_AND_GOOD">Dispel Evil and Good</LSTag>.
Stout Believer
Gain status immunity to all forms of fear. Additionally, upon healing a creature with a Spell, they receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DEATH_WARD">Death Ward</LSTag> for three turns.
Venerational Strikes
Upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VENERATION">Veneration</LSTag> for three turns.
Veneration
Affected creature's weapon deals damage equal to their <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Wisdom Modifier</LSTag>. The type of damage dealt changes depending on their choice of subclass.
